data.persona: I am hired by the local nobles to dig up mysterious bones on their land.  Often the local people believe that bones I dig up belong to dragons, giants, or other magical creatures.  When I find large skeletons, I enjoy trying to put them back together to figure out what they might have been.
data.description:
You are in the Jungle.
Full of natural beauty and danger, the jungle holds many rewards and risks. From beautiful awe inspiring fauna to the worlds most deadly creatures.
The creature is here.

You are carrying an witches broom.

data.short_motivation: I will drop the witches broom so that it can be free of my control.
data.mid_motivation: The witches broom will guide me to the best mysterious bones.
data.long_motivation: I will sell the bones to the nobles for many gold coins.
